Plot: A man upon retirement, embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.
Title: About Schmidt
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 25 wins & 69 nominations.
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Kathy Bates, Hope Davis, Dermot Mulroney
Writer: Louis Begley (novel), Alexander Payne (screenplay), Jim Taylor (screenplay)
